name: Parkour dude (Memetime101)
description:
This is my first game after many trials and errors and I wanted to create this for IT class to surprise the teacher. Can I make a game in under 9 hours play this short demo to find out? 

W=move forward

A=move left

S=move back

D =move right

SHIFT=Glide/slide/crouch

SPACE=Jump
